**Vector Signal Analyzer**
====================================

### Reference Number
[cb-8425-65817088](#)

### Solicitation Number
[NPP20230907](#)

### Tender Notice
#### Published Date
2023-08-24

#### Closing Date
2023-09-14, 14:00 EST

#### Description
A request for supply arrangement for the procurement of Vector Signal Analyzers is issued. Amendment #1 extends the tender closing date to September 14, 2023, and modifies the expected contract start date to September 18, 2023.

### Request for Tender
#### Description
The Government of Canada is seeking bids for the procurement of a Vector Signal Analyzer. The Vector Signal Analyzer is required for use at the Communications Research Centre (CRC) in Ottawa, Ontario. 

#### Solicitation Number
NPP20230907

#### Exigences
The Vector Signal Analyzer must meet the requirements specified in the attached Mandatory Requirement Documentation (Annexe A). Bidders must ensure that their proposed Vector Signal Analyzer meets the technical requirements and is compatible with existing equipment at the CRC.

#### Method of Procurement
Competitive - Open bidding, with the lowest price being the basis of selection.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Deliverables
The winning bidder will be required to deliver the Vector Signal Analyzer to the Communications Research Centre (CRC) by no later than March 31, 2024.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Samantha Amadio, Procurement Specialist, at 343-542-2505 or samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca . 


### Technical Evaluation Criteria
The technical evaluation will consider the following criteria:
